channel.title: Ripping Xbox games and emulating them on your computer?
channel.description: I know people can do this but how? I have Cxbx, Alcohol 120%, and MagicISO. I ripped Splinter cell with Alcohol, extracted it with MagicISO, and now what? I have a bunch of random files that mean nothing to me. .MDF and .MDS files. Anyone help?

item.title: Ripping Xbox games and emulating them on your computer?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“YourDistracted, post:17, topic:71846”][quote author=crazycam10 link=topic=105567.msg1065135#msg1065135 date=1175256484]
No It Wasnt Lol , I Have More Than 5 IQ -.- , I Can Tell Which Are Viruses On Limewire
[/quote]
No you can’t you dipshit. And stop typing every word with a capital…[/quote]
lol isnt that hard to tell what files are viruses, just get a good scanner, then the second u double click it to start dl, it sais it is and stops it…

Read full topic

item.title: Ripping Xbox games and emulating them on your computer?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“crazycam10, post:13, topic:71846”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=105567.msg1060715#msg1060715 date=1175127084]
There are no emulators for the Xbox that can play commercial games with any degree of success, except I believe the last version of Xeon before it died could play Halo.
[/quote]

I Had One Once From Limewire , No Idea If It Was Any Good Though , Never Got Round To Installing It :P[/quote]
probably a virus/trojan

item.source: Ripping Xbox games and emulating them on your computer?

item.title: Ripping Xbox games and emulating them on your computer?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

PS2 games are rather easily copied tbh, all you need is a gameshark version 2 and a ‘backup’ copy of a game which i get from demonoid.com. Too copy them from a game itself is rather more complicated procedure that sometimes involves removing ‘spaces’ in the data on the disc in order for the PS2 to read it, there are also numerous memory and hard drive exploits.

Gameshark copying
Memory card exploits
Copy games to PS2 harddrive.

EDIT:
XBOX Softmodding

Read full topic

@therealjdb wrote:
